analysis_summary.key_discovery: Windows mutexes are re-entrant by design for same thread/process
analysis_summary.impact: No code changes needed - only test expectation updates

test_2.name: Duplicate Prevention (Same Process)
test_2.reason: Windows mutexes are re-entrant - same thread can acquire multiple times
test_2.action: Update test to expect re-entrant behavior

test_4.name: Cross-Session Blocking
test_4.reason: Child processes may inherit handles in same security context
test_4.action: Enhance test to use completely separate processes

test_5.name: Held Mutex Detection
test_5.reason: Cannot determine ownership without acquisition attempt

recommendation: CONTINUE: Proceed to Phase 1 Day 2 - Manifest-Based Configuration System. Begin with Hour 1-2: Design Manifest Schema for subsystem configuration templates.
